class.name: WaveformRect
class.brief_description: Basic display node for audio waves.
class.description: Base class displaying an audio waveform for [AudioStream], with the help of the internal AudioStreamPreview class.

method.name: update_waveform
method.description: Godot calls this method every time [member stream] changes. The user is allowed to force the call. When called, it redraws the waveform.

members.member: The color used to draw the waveform.
The [AudioStream] to render as a waveform.

signal.name: waveform_updated
signal.description: Emitted when the waveform finishes drawing.
